verses.name: Psalms 112:1
verses.text: Praise ye the Lord. Blessed is the man that feareth the Lord, that delighteth greatly in his commandments.

verses.name: Psalms 112:2
verses.text: His seed shall be mighty upon earth: the generation of the upright shall be blessed.

verses.name: Psalms 112:3
verses.text: Wealth and riches shall be in his house: and his righteousness endureth for ever.

verses.name: Psalms 112:4
verses.text: Unto the upright there ariseth light in the darkness: he is gracious, and full of compassion, and righteous.

verses.name: Psalms 112:5
verses.text: A good man sheweth favour, and lendeth: he will guide his affairs with discretion.

verses.name: Psalms 112:6
verses.text: Surely he shall not be moved for ever: the righteous shall be in everlasting remembrance.

verses.name: Psalms 112:7
verses.text: He shall not be afraid of evil tidings: his heart is fixed, trusting in the Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 112:8
verses.text: His heart is established, he shall not be afraid, until he see his desire upon his enemies.

verses.name: Psalms 112:9
verses.text: He hath dispersed, he hath given to the poor; his righteousness endureth for ever; his horn shall be exalted with honour.

verses.name: Psalms 112:10
verses.text: The wicked shall see it, and be grieved; he shall gnash with his teeth, and melt away: the desire of the wicked shall perish.
